name: blast-radius
description: Interactive visualizations of Terraform dependency graphs
full_description:
Read more about 28mm/blast-radius:

 * GitHub: https://www.github.com/28mm/blast-radius
 * Documentation: https://28mm.github.io/blast-radius-docs

Run 28mm/blast-radius in a directory containing a Terraform project:

````
docker run --rm -it -p 5000:5000 \
  -v $(pwd):/data:ro \
  --security-opt apparmor:unconfined \
  --cap-add=SYS_ADMIN \
  28mm/blast-radius
````
